mapper.select: select a.post_date , a.stock_code , a.high , a.low , a.open , a.close , a.volume , b.corp_name from daily_market_amt a , corp_info b where a.stock_code = b.stock_code and a.stock_code = #{stockCode} and a.post_date between to_char(CURRENT_DATE - 5, 'yyyymmdd') and to_char(CURRENT_DATE, 'yyyymmdd') order by a.post_date desc
select a.post_date , a.stock_code , a.high , a.low , a.open , a.close , a.volume from daily_market_amt a where a.stock_code = #{stockCode} and a.post_date = #{postDate} limit 1
